DOC.detailed_description: The Swiss Emergency Triage Scale ( SETS ) use triage emergency department Switzerland , France Belgium . No validated triage scale actually use EMS provider . The objective project evaluate reliability performance triage EMS provider SETS . In order perform evaluation cohort 22 EMS provider evaluate 28 standardized clinical scenario use computer simulator .
